conbody.p: The elements of a command are represented by the formula: Verb+ Set/Class. Users can keep track of these elements using the Current Command box, located near the top of the Command Tab. The Current Command box changes according to which Set/Class types and Verbs are in a Selected state at any given time. If no Set/Class types or Verbs have been Selected, it will display the greyed out formula Verb + Set/Class to indicate these elments are empty.
